item.title: Video Ad Production - Upwork
item.description:
Legendary Landscape is a premier landscaping company based in Orlando, Florida, specializing in vinyl fence installations, among other landscaping services. We are currently rebranding and expanding our marketing efforts and need a professional to help us create a compelling video ad.

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced video ad creator to produce a high-quality advertisement for our vinyl fence installation services. We have a voice-over, script, and logo ready. We need someone who can source or create vinyl fence installation footage and integrate it with our provided materials. Additionally, we need to assign the provided voice-over to a male figure generated using AI to enhance the video's appeal.

Responsibilities:

Create or source high-quality vinyl fence installation video footage.
Integrate our provided voice-over, script, and logo into the video.
Use AI to generate a male figure that will be featured in the video and sync the voice-over to this figure.
Ensure the final video is professional, engaging, and aligns with our brand image.
Collaborate with our team to incorporate any feedback and make necessary revisions.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video creation and editing, with a portfolio of previous work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Experience with AI-generated figures and integrating voice-overs.
Ability to source or create high-quality vinyl fence installation footage.
Strong attention to detail and creativity.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work within deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating ads for landscaping or home improvement services.
Familiarity with branding and marketing strategies.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:12 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Commercial, Facebook Ad Campaign, Advertisement, Advertising, AI Video Generation, Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Commercial, Facebook Ad Campaign, Advertisement, Advertising, AI Video Generation, Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Logo Animation and Explainer/Promo Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are a software company looking for a talented individual who can create captivating logo animations and potentially future explainer/promo videos. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their ability to bring static logos to life through seamless animation. They should also have experience in creating engaging explainer/promo videos that effectively communicate complex concepts in a concise and visually appealing manner. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work within defined brand guidelines are essential.
   
   Skills required:
   - Logo animation
   - Video editing
   - Motion graphics
   - Storyboarding
   - Adobe After Effects
   
   This is a small to medium-sized project that will require the successful candidate to work closely with our marketing team to understand our brand identity and create visually impactful animations and videos. The duration of the project is expected to be 1 to 2 months, with the possibility of future collaboration.
   
   Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $17.00-$39.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:45 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Explainer Video, 3D Animation
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Explainer Video, 3D Animation
Country: United States

item.title: Video & Audio Content Creator for B2B Business - Upwork
item.description:
This is going to be long-term ongoing work as we plan to launch a new suite of solutions and product categories in the UK, EU, and USA.

TO APPLY, YOU MUST SEND A SAMPLE OF YOUR WORK VIDEO / AUDIO USING GENERATIVE AI

We are looking for a marketing / content creation partner who is thoroughly familiar with using the most sophisticated AI tools; chatbots, generative AI (avatar videos) and audio content creation tools/platforms.

We want someone who can create videos for business content that is NOT too corporate in style. We want catchy content that uses mild humour to educate our audience by gaining their attention and maintaining their interest in our solutions.

Importantly, we need someone well-versed in creating videos with a blend of stock video footage, AI Avatars, and animations.

Ongoing work will involve creating the following content:

VIDEOS FOR SALES ENABLEMENT

• Video adverts for all our product categories
• Video adverts for our agency
• Explainer videos
• Sales pitch videos
• Video content posts
• Converting blogs / market insight posts into short catchy videos for socials
• (Sales) Training videos

PODCAST
• Latest market insights
• Consultative content for businesses and employees

AI CHATBOTS FOR SALES ENABLEMENT
• Sales Q&As
• Online order processing







Hourly Range: $10.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:43 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Corporate Video, Short Video Ad, Spokesperson Video, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Content Writing
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Corporate Video, Short Video Ad, Spokesperson Video, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Content Writing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Stabilize interview footage in After Effects and/or Catalyst Browse - Upwork
item.description:
Very simple task: I have a 90-min interview that was shot handheld and due to camera movement, the footage is unusable. I've tried some post-stabilization techniques in Premiere and Catalyst Browse (it was shot on a Sony camera), but it's not giving the results I'm looking for.

Your task is to get as much of the interview to be stable as possible. Getting all of it stable is impossible, but the closer the better. If you've used Sony-specific software you may find that useful to include in the workflow, but it won't be enough on its own. Below is a sample of the interview. Include in your proposal how you plan to fix it; any proposal without that will be ignored.

Thank you!

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XUcPWeo6kfX2Itr-9k6dM4D0c8jes4mr/view?usp=sharing

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor For Creative Agency - Upwork
item.description:
We need to hire multiple short form video editors/clippers for our creative agency!

We are a creative agency specializing in creating and editing short form content for businesses!

We’re a very driven, focused, and passionate team and we’re looking to bring on more editors who share our drive for what they do!

If you’re passionate about what you do, excited to grow, and have a great attitude, we’d love to work with you!

We believe everyday is a chance to advance forward, and become a better version of yourself. Our workspace is uplifting, encouraging, and inspiring.

Job Details and Requirements
You’ll be editing and clipping short videos.
Adding captions, sound effects, visual effects, soundtracks, etc
Helping come up with creative ideas and add your own creative touch to the videos you edit
Ability to edit 3 videos per day to keep up with our deadlines
Identifying entertaining and potentially high performing clips
Be able to adapt to various styles, as you’ll be editing for multiple different clients of ours, each requiring a different style.
Extensive editing experience required
Must be fluent in English

Payment structure will be pay per video. Pay can change depending on complexity, and will be agreed upon before work is completed.

There will be opportunities for pay increase and bonuses as we work together!

Our typical budget is $15 per video, and can increase if the video is more complex, or decrease if it’s a very simple video.

We expect 3 videos edited per day, which ends up around a $1,000-$1,300/mo pay, depending on your availability and ability to edit that quantity

We are looking for full time, dedicated, and focused editors to bring onto our team!

If this sounds like you’d be a great fit, please send a proposal with your portfolio and resume!

Thank you so much! We look forward to working with you!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: I am looking for a Video Editor for my Anime Youtube Chanel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!

I am looking for a professional to create / edit a YouTube video about Anime.

About 1 to max 2 video's per week
The length of the video should be between 8-12 minutes long and pay $40 dollar per video.

I will provide the script, voice over and thumbnail (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

I am looking for someone who:
- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience using video editing softwares such as Adobe Premiere Pro
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline
- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.
- Can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging.

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite anime Character at the beginning or end of your proposal!

Also, if you’ve ever made a youtube cashcow video in the Anime niche, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!




Budget: $40
Posted On: June 20, 2024 20:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production

item.title: Virtual Assistant/Administrator with Video Editing Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and punctual virtual assistant/administrator to join our team. As a virtual assistant, you will be responsible for various administrative tasks, including managing calendars, organizing files, and handling correspondence. Additionally, you should have proficiency in video editing software such as Canva, CapCut, and Bandzoogle. The ideal candidate must be familiar with creating and editing videos, adding effects and transitions, and optimizing them for different platforms.

  Skills required:
- Email marketing experience preferred
  - Strong organizational and time management skills
  - Proficient in Canva, CapCut, Bandzoogle, and other video editing software
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Good communication and interpersonal skills
  - Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively

  This project that will require your commitment and has the potential to turn into a long term position. We are looking for an intermediate-level virtual assistant/administrator with book keeping, scheduling, marketing material creations email marketing, website editing and general virtual assistance. If you have the right skills and can dedicate the required time, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$5.00

We are seeking a detail-oriented and punctual virtual assistant/administrator to join our team. As a virtual assistant, you will be responsible for various administrative tasks, including managing calendars, organizing files, and handling correspondence. Additionally, you should have proficiency in video editing software such as Canva, CapCut, and Bandzoogle. The ideal candidate must be familiar with creating and editing videos, adding effects and transitions, and optimizing them for different platforms.

  Skills required:
- Email marketing experience preferred
  - Strong organizational and time management skills
  - Proficient in Canva, CapCut, Bandzoogle, and other video editing software
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Good communication and interpersonal skills
  - Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively

  This project that will require your commitment and has the potential to turn into a long term position. We are looking for an intermediate-level virtual assistant/administrator with book keeping, scheduling, marketing material creations email marketing, website editing and general virtual assistance. If you have the right skills and can dedicate the required time, we would love to hear from you.
